entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Simcoe
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:06 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Delhi 3:00 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
Temperature: 1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 54 %
Dewpoint: -6.4°C
Wind: E 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then periods of rain beginning after midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 4 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain becoming mixed with drizzle in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. High 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
